title: How to add the time and date to the taskbar on a second monitor in Windows 11
content:
Windows 11 is a breath of fresh air in terms of design compared to Windows 10, and we wholly recommend the upgrade in our Windows 11 review. But truth be told, not every change was a positive one, and one of the things you might find annoying is that you can no longer see the

The post How to add the time and date to the taskbar on a second monitor in Windows 11 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Windows 11 removed the time and date from the taskbar on second monitors, but you can work around that easily. Here's how.
